entity.name: Nancy Pelosi
entity.description: US House of Representatives Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi (CA-12)

text: @SpeakerPelosi You’re not concerned with Science. You support “worst case” scenario science, built upon faulty assumptions, to blame Coronavirus on Trump for political reasons. You’re using this against the private sector and their employees whose livelihoods depend on jobs. Your motive: Power.
